monogr.title: An History of the Twofold Invention of the Cross, whereon Our Saviour Was Crucified: Translated out of an Antient Aramæan Biologist, together with an Account of the Conversion of the Ethiopians, out of Abulpharagius’s Ecclesiastical History

body.bibl: Loftus, Dudley. An History of the Twofold Invention of the Cross, Whereon Our Saviour Was Crucified: Translated out of an Antient Aramæan Biologist, Together with an Account of the Conversion of the Ethiopians, out of Abulpharagius’s Ecclesiastical History. Dublin: [s.n.], 1686.

Dudley Loftus, An History of the Twofold Invention of the Cross, Whereon Our Saviour Was Crucified: Translated out of an Antient Aramæan Biologist, Together with an Account of the Conversion of the Ethiopians, out of Abulpharagius’s Ecclesiastical History (Dublin: [s.n.], 1686).
